title: Unable to copy data from pixel 2 to new pixel 4 phone
content:
I am trying to set up my new pixel 4 by copying everything from my old pixel 2 and it is pretty frustrating.

I tried using the cable that came with the pixel 4, Nexus 6p cable, pixel 2 cable, Anker cable but the transfer protocol keeps prompting me to change to another cable that can transfer data.

I had no problems transferring data from my iPhone to pixel 2 in the past. Is there a problem with my new phone?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
